```{r setup}
library(hw3cca)
## basic example code
set.seed(123)
x <- matrix(rnorm(2000), 1000, 2)
y <- matrix(rnorm(2000), 1000, 2)
cca_simple(x, y)
cancor(x,y)[1:3]

x <- matrix(rnorm(200000), 40000, 5)
y <- matrix(rnorm(200000), 40000, 5)
cca_simple(x, y)
cancor(x,y)[1:3]

x <- matrix(rnorm(200000), 5000, 40)
y <- matrix(rnorm(200000), 5000, 40)
cca_simple(x, y)
cancor(x,y)[1:3]
```
